title: Saudi Arabia - Umrah Visa

details.title: Eligibility
items: Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of travel.
This visa is exclusively for the purpose of performing Umrah.

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport with minimum 6 months validity.
Biometric enrollment receipt (as per Saudi requirements).
Confirmed hotel voucher for the entire Umrah stay.
Confirmed transport voucher (as per Saudi regulations).

note: Visa issuance time is subject to Embassy and Hajj Ministry approval. Ensure all bookings (hotel, transport, air) are confirmed before application. Chologhuri only processes tourist, business, and religious visas like Umrah — not work or residency.
